about_the_game:
They are... approching...
Surging...
...
Today...
...

Collect the resources ,build your defense, do your best before the dark.
And then...Protecting the Tower of Daybreak

Game Features：

- The demo version(DEMO) includes 12 normal levels, 12 challenge levels, and 13 very different defense towers that can be obtained!
- 100+unique challenges are waiting for you to challenge! Enjoy both difficulty and fun！
- Countless enemies, do your best not to let the Wave composed of gray geometric enemies overwhelm your defense！
- Extremely minimalist design style, diffrently age appropriate gameplay, simple and easy to learn operation style, diverse difficulty classification, suitable for every member of your family!

name: Minimalist Tower Defense Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Collect the resources ,build your defense, do your best before the dark. And then...Face those indescribable countless enemies！
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
